alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Mower; Olmsted; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:31AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Minnesota through 615 AM CDT... At 530 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stewartville, or 14 miles south of Rochester, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chatfield around 545 AM CDT. St. Charles around 555 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Saratoga, Cummingsville, Washington, Troy, Arendahl and Pleasant Grove. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 205 and 206, and between mile markers 230 and 238. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
